name: Super Street Battle
description: A strategy game for car enthusiasts, to battle others to game money and upgrade car stats.
technologies: MERN stack application, Firebase Auth, Javascript, Bootstrap and CSS.

name: Porcelain
description: A Yelp/Instagram inspired restroom finder application. Because when you gotta go you gotta know!
technologies: MySQL, Node.js, React, Express, AWS, Google Map API, Javascript, and Bootstrap.

name: Day Out
description: Want to plan your day in a specific area but don't know what to do, where to go, or how to get there? Well then this app is just what you need!
technologies: Javascript, Firebase Auth, Firestore, Yelp API, Mapquest API, and Materialize.

name: Harry Potter RPG
description: An RPG game featuring key characters in the Harry Potter franchise. Where you must pick your hero and battle the 3 remaining characters.
